text:
Darwin Gale Schisler (March 2, 1933 – February 2, 2020) was an American former teacher and politician. He served as a member of the United States House of Representatives from Illinois's 19th congressional district and a member of the Illinois House of Representatives from the 46th district and later the 48th district.
Schisler died on February 2, 2020, in Mesa, Arizona at the age of 86.
